title: Treffpunkt Deutschland. Episodes 1-5
creator_credit: John Thomas, John Billingham and BBC
brief_description: A compilation tape of five programmes designed to help students in their second or third year of learning German. The programmes are built around everyday experiences of some German teenagers and are entirely in German. A simple linking commentary repeats and reinforces the most useful language used. Individual titles indicate content of each program.
